GuideContent.title: Locate the hidden lair in the hospital
GuideContent.description: Toca Life: World features countless secrets that are waiting to be discovered. As an example, you’ll be able to explore a mad scientists mysterious hidden lair which is located within the hospital grounds. Just be warned that even when you find the entrance to the mad scientists.

GuideContent.title: Place hats on your pets in order to stack them
GuideContent.description: If you place hats on all of your pets you’ll be able to stack them on top of each other. You may want to see how many pets you can stack on top of each other.

GuideContent.title: Activate the secret dance floor in the park
GuideContent.description: While you’re exploring the park you can also dance on a secret dance floor. To activate it simply click on the secret button which is located right underneath the radio. Instantly a disco ball will drop down and you’ll get to take part in a fun dance party.

GuideContent.title: Experiment with creating new types of pet food
GuideContent.description: If you visit the pet cafe you’ll be free to create new types of pet food. For example, you’ll be able to serve your pets a sandwich made out of dog food or a salad which is packed full of worms. Once you’ve served your pets your new creations watch their reactions to see if they enjoyed your food or not.

GuideContent.title: Head to the city district to hunt for hidden treasures
GuideContent.description: When you’re exploring the city district ensure to hunt for hidden treasures. As you’ll be surprised at just how many treasures are hidden within the city.
